TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
I'll take it back to the kitchen immediately!

*comes back* Here is your new soup, sir. With KSP in it.

Waiter... you're not in my soup...

2bad4u.

Waiter! The Illuminati is in my soup!

The government will cover it all up. Oh wait, illuminati has total power over it.

Waiter, there is a high temperature rapid baking oven in my soup.

Fine, I'll go to the kitchen now!

*Later* Here's your oven soup. Cold oven soup.

Waiter, there is a BSOD in my soup!

Here *hands over a spinning beach ball of death* throw this at the BSOD

Waiter, Earth is in my soup.

No sir, that is your nice blue 'meat'ball with white cream on it.

Waiter, you put your signature in my soup.

but you ordered my signature soup!

waiter! the kraken is in my soup!

ERr0r 40499999999p4gen0tf0und666h4ilsat4n666hailsat4n

(Also, that pun made me spit my drink out )

Waiter, there is a beaten dead horse in my soup, and it includes modern warfare and excessive amounts of guns in it!

(I don't actually plan those dumb games)

Not my fault! Sue us if you have a problem!

Waiter, there's a cracker in my soup... It's delicious.

OH NO!!!!! HE SAID ITS DELICIOUS!!!

waiter, why is there a nuke in my soup?

For the extra spicy taste. A true explosion of flavors.

WAITER! There is a red traffic light in my soup!

It's a spicy traffic light, just like a mama used to make.

Waiter, there's a jerry can in my soup.

Ah yes sir, thats the gasoline special soup.

Waiter, why is your wig in my soup? and why are you bald?

That wasn't a wig!!!

Waiter, there's a barnacle in my soup.

Crowbar with your meal sir?

Waiter, there's a sense of self worth in my soup!

WHAT???!!!!!!!!!!!! DOES THAT EVEN EXIST!??!??!?!?!?!?!?

waiter the space captian is in my soup

Kill him because he disregards the sacred Orbital Mechanics!

Waiter, there's a cyanide pill in my soup.

No no no! Its a perfectly harmless placebo. Call off the assassination attempt, he knows.

Waiter! There's a lot of coins in my soup!

Right, I'll tell the new cook, Mario, about this.

Waiter, there is a RT-10 SRB in my soup

Wait, you aren't Zekes? So much for stopping the production of Dreks...

Waiter, is there a zombified rat in my soup? I just stabbed it with a fork, and it isn't dead.

It seems like World War Z is about to begin, looks like Israel look good now

WAITER, there is a anti aircraft turret in my soup

WHY DOES EVERYONE HERE LOOK LIKE A ZOSEKIA SKUNKWORKS EMPLOYEE!

Waiter, your mom is in the soup. Wait... why are you only moaning? AAAAAAH ZOMBIE!

what. I don't even.

waiter why are you in my soup?

because i tripped and fell sir, terribly sorry for this inconvenience

Waiter, why am i in my soup?

To be honest, I have no idea.

Waiter, why is there soup in my soup?
